title: Rachel Reeves – 2022 Comments on the Dismissal of Kwasi Kwarteng
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 14 October 2022.
content:
This humiliating u-turn is necessary – but the real damage has already been done.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

This is a Tory crisis, made in Downing Street.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It won’t be forgiven or forgotten.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Only a Labour government has the credibility and authority to fix this mess.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
